Summary: Metro orlando dual lights changing colors in the clouds at night at low level with no sound.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around June 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas standing on the south side of my house at 9 pm and witnessed a bright pulsing light changing colors from white to orange to red.Was moving through a low cloud base from the sw to the ne. Object was moving at around 250mph and about 600 feet off the ground.About five minutes later the same light came through the same flight path. No sound was heard on either encounter.There was a light rain at the time of both encounters. Was not an airplane.
